column2: "Na afei wɔnam gyedzi do ebu hɛn bem ntsi
column3: yɛnam hɛn Ewuradze Jesus Kraest do enya Nyankopɔn afamu asomdwee;"

column2: "ɔnam no do so na yɛdze gyedzi enya adom yi a yegyina mu yi mu kwan; na yɛhyehyɛ hɛnho wɔ Nyankopɔn enyimnyam ho enyidado mu."
"Na nnyɛ yi nko bi
column3: na mbom yɛhyehyɛ hɛnho wɔ ahohia mu so: osiandɛ yenyim dɛ ahohia dze abotar ba;"

column2: "na abotar dze osuahu ba; na osuahu dze enyidado ba;"
"na enyidado nnhyɛ enyito
column3: osiandɛ wɔnam Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn a wɔdze ama hɛn no do ehue Nyankopɔn dɔ egu hɛn akoma mu."

column2: "Na yɛda ho yɛ mberɛw no
column3: ber a ɔsɛ mu na Kraest wui maa ebusuyɛfo."

column2: "Na nyia ɔyɛ nyimpa tsenenee mpo
column3: ɔbɛyɛ dzen ana obi ewu ama no: bi annyɛ a
column5: obi besi no bo dɛ obowu ama no."

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn kyerɛɛ no dɔ wɔ hɛn do dɛ yɛda ho yɛ ndzebɔnyɛfo no
"Dɛm ntsi afei mbom a woedua no bɔgyaa do ebu hɛn bem yi
column3: wɔnam no do bɛgye hɛn nkwa efi ebufuw no mu."

column2: "Na sɛ yɛyɛɛ atamfo no
column3: wɔnam ne Ba no no wu do kaa hɛn nye Nyankopɔn bɔɔ mu a
column4: afei mbom a wɔaka hɛn abɔ mu yi wobodua no nkwa no do agye hɛn nkwa;"

column2: "na nnyɛ yi nko bi
column3: na mbom yɛhyehyɛ hɛnho wɔ Nyankopɔn mu
column4: osian hɛn Ewuradze Jesus Kraest a sesei yɛnam no do enya nkabɔmu ntsi."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi dɛ mbrɛ bɔn nam nyimpa kor do baa wiadze
column3: na owu nam bɔn do bae no
column4: dɛmara na owu twaa mu baa nyimpa nyina do
column5: dɛ hɔn nyina ayɛ bɔn ntsi:"

column2: "na bɔn wɔ wiadze ansaana mbra no reba
"Na owu dzii hen fii Adam do besii Moses do
column3: wɔ hɔn mpo a hɔn bɔn nntse dɛ Adam nedze a ɔyɛ mbrato no. Dɛm Adam yi na wɔdze no toto nyia ɔbɛba no ho."

column2: "Na nnyɛ mbrɛ mbrato no tse na adom akyɛdze no so tse. Na sɛ ɔbaakofo ne mbrato ntsi dodowara ewu a
column3: Nyankopɔn adom nye adom akyɛdze a ɔwɔ nyimpa kor Jesus Kraest mu no abor do ama dodowara."

column2: "Na nnyɛ dɛ mbrɛ ɔnam ɔbaakofo a ɔyɛɛ bɔn no do bae no na akyɛdze no tse
column3: na atsɛmbu no nam baakofo do bɛdaan afɔbu
column4: na adom akyɛdze no nam mbrato do bɛdaan abembu."

column2: "Na sɛ ɔbaakofo ne mbrato ntsi na owu nam ɔbaakofo no do dzii hen a
column3: hɔn a woenya adom nye tsenenee akyɛdze no mbordo no so nam ɔbaakofo
column4: Jesus Kraest do bedzi hen wɔ nkwa mu akyɛn dɛm."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei dɛ mbrɛ afɔbu nam ɔbaakofo mbrato do baa nyimpa nyina do no
column3: dɛmara so na nkwa abembu nam ɔbaakofo abemdzi do baa nyimpa nyina do nye no."

column2: "Na dɛ mbrɛ dodowara nam nyimpa kor n'asoɔdzen do bɛyɛɛ ndzebɔnyɛfo no
column3: mbrɛ dodowara nam ɔbaakofo ne setsie do bɛyɛ atseneneefo nye no."

column2: "Na mbra no kaa ho bae
column3: ma mbrato aadɔɔ so: na mbrɛ bɔn adɔɔ so no

column2: "ma dɛ mbrɛ bɔn edzi hen wɔ wu mu no
column3: dɛmara so na adom nam tsenenee do eedzi hen akɔ onnyiewiei nkwa mu
column4: ɔnam Jesus Kraest hɛn Ewuradze do."
